ch.hearc.orlac.transitionmachine

Class TransitionMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hearc.orlac.transitionmachine.TransitionMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TransitionMachine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handle the transition effects between the application states.
    This transition machine is a Thread and computes the transition effects in function of the application state.
    Author:
    chavailm

      • run

        public void run()
        Contains the logic of the state machine.
        Check the presence of the user's hands and computes the right state.
